endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all monitored pipelines and their details.
Add a new pipeline to be included in the monitoring system.
Retrieve the current status and condition details of a specific pipeline.
Report an observed issue or anomaly in the pipeline operations.
Retrieve a list of all triggered alerts for pipeline issues.
Update the maintenance status or schedule for a specific pipeline.
Retrieve the latest readings from a specific IoT sensor.
Calibrate a specific IoT sensor to ensure accuracy.
Remove a pipeline from the monitoring system.
Retrieve an analytical overview of the monitored systems with aggregated data trends.
